attributes.action: lower the age of cancer screening for all cancers
attributes.additional_details: act now on lowering the age of screening for cancer . i have suffered many losses due to cancers of many kinds in my family and cannot be screened due to the age limits set by the goverment in the failing nhs funding  . but this is not about me its about needless many dying due to unessary and late un diagnosed hyreditary in many cases cancers . lowering the age of screening will save lives
